channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: From chess to a medical mystery: Great global reads from 2025 you may have missed
item.description: We published hundreds of stories on global health and development each year. Some are ... alas ... a bit underappreciated by readers. We've asked our ...

item.title: Trump says Ukraine peace is closer. And, how funding cuts affect anti-poverty groups
item.description: Trump and Ukraine's Volodymyr Zelenskyy signaled momentum on peace talks after a meeting yesterday. And, anti-poverty groups address challenges they a...

item.title: FIFA president defends World Cup ticket prices, saying demand is hitting records
item.description: The FIFA President addressed outrage over ticket prices for the World Cup by pointing to record demand and reiterating that most of the proceeds will ...

item.title: 'Raising questions' isn't enough. The best films of the year took a stance
item.description: Now is not the time for subtlety, nostalgia or neutrality on screen.

item.title: The U.S. offers Ukraine a 15-year security guarantee for now, Zelenskyy says
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said the United States is offering his country security guarantees for 15 years as part of a proposed peace pl...

item.title: US pledges $2bn for humanitarian aid, but tells UN 'adapt or die'
item.description: The pledge was welcomed by the UN, but comes after previous major cuts to US funding for humanitarian operations.

item.title: Nepal to scrap 'failed' Mount Everest waste deposit scheme
item.description: Under the scheme, climbers paid a $4,000 deposit that was returned if they brought 8kg of waste down the mountain.

item.title: Ukraine denies drone attack on Putin's residence
item.description: Russia has accused Ukraine of targeting a presidential residence, which President Zelensky called "typical Russian lies".

item.title: 2 New Jersey pilots killed in a helicopter collision frequented a cafe together near the crash site
item.description: Authorities have identified two pilots who died after their helicopters collided midair in southern New Jersey.

item.title: How Kenya became the "Silicon Savannah"
item.description: The tech hub of East Africa, Kenya—and Nairobi in particular—is looking to solve an impending jobs crisis through innovation.

item.title: How much will a $40,000 CD account earn in 2026?
item.description: The interest-earning potential of a $40,000 CD account in 2026 is considerable. Here's how much savers can earn.

item.title: 12/21: Face The Nation
item.description: This week on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan," Republican Rep. Thomas Massie and Democratic Rep. Ro Khanna join to discuss the newest batch of ...

item.title: Winter storm could become "bomb cyclone" over Great Lakes and Northeast
item.description: A powerful winter storm system could become a "bomb cyclone" over the Great Lakes and Northeast regions this week.

item.title: Egyptian dissident sorry for tweets after calls for deportation from UK
item.description: Shabana Mahmood is facing growing calls to revoke the citizenship of Alaa Abdel Fattah after the emergence of social media posts.

item.title: Watch Live: Trump says Hamas must disarm very soon or "there will be hell to pay"
item.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu also announced President Trump will receive the Israel Prize for his work on peace negotiations.

item.title: Trump meets Netanyahu in Florida as focus turns to Middle East issues
item.description: They are set to discuss Iran, Lebanon, Syria and Gaza, where the Trump administration wants to see the ceasefire enter its second stage in January.

item.title: The moon and sun figure big in the new year’s lineup of cosmic wonders
New York subway ends its MetroCard era and switches fully to tap-and-go fares
